name: Photography tour of Leicester
description: I can arrange to meet you where ever you are staying and will take you on foot to some of the most interesting parts of the city, and point out things that you might want to capture with your Camera, I will tell you a bit of the history as we go along but mostly it is about the photography, depending on what time of day we start the tour  we may visit one of the many good eating places in Leicester for Lunch.
